heading: ***EXTREME COLD WATCH SATURDAY AFTERNOON AND SUNDAY FOR NY, VT, THE BERKSHIRES, INTO WESTERN AND NORTHERN NH***Today
text: Morning clouds through the north and mountains, a few flurries, giving way to increasing sunshine. Becoming mostly sunny south. Highs in the upper teens to low 20s north, in the 20s south. Winds northwest 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Mainly clear, with some high clouds, especially west. Much colder. Lows 5 below to 5 above south, and 5 to 15 below zero north. North winds up to 10 mph in the evening, diminishing to light and variable.

heading: Friday
text: Periods of sunshine giving way to clouds. A chance of snow in NY toward evening. Highs ranging through the 20s. Light winds, becoming south up to 10 mph.
